content:
Hi! My name is Partha Ghosh and I am a first year Master’s student in Machine Learning of the Department of Computer Science at the University of Tübingen. Previously, I did my Bachelor’s from Indian Statistical Institute with a Major in Mathematics and Minors in Statistics, Computer Science and Physics.
 Download my resumé. --
summary: Hi! My name is Partha Ghosh and I am a first year Master’s student in Machine Learning of the Department of Computer Science at the University of Tübingen. Previously, I did my Bachelor’s from Indian Statistical Institute with a Major in Mathematics and Minors in Statistics, Computer Science and Physics.
title: Partha Ghosh

content: Worked on several Machine Learning Challenges including ‘Heart Diseases Detection’, ‘Spam Detection’, ‘Twitter Sentiment Analysis’. Achieved 88% accuracy on heart diseases detection using a Depp Neural Network and 98% accuracy on spam detection using a character level RNN and 70% accuracy on twitter sentiment analysis.
summary: Worked on several Machine Learning Challenges including ‘Heart Diseases Detection’, ‘Spam Detection’, ‘Twitter Sentiment Analysis’. Achieved 88% accuracy on heart diseases detection using a Depp Neural Network and 98% accuracy on spam detection using a character level RNN and 70% accuracy on twitter sentiment analysis.
title: Kaggle Machine Learning Challenges

content: Built this animation engine with Python as fun a project. Can be used to create 2D/3D animations programmatically.
summary: Built this animation engine with Python as fun a project. This software can be used to create 2D/3D animations programmatically.
title: PyEffects

content: Built a vertical pen plotter, a drawing machine, using raspberry pi, stepper and servo motors. Wrote the software in Python to control the machine to draw on paper parsing the hpgl code of a vector image.
summary: Built a vertical pen plotter, a drawing machine, using raspberry pi, stepper and servo motors. Wrote the software in Python to control the machine to draw on paper parsing the hpgl code of a vector image.
title: Vertical Pen Plotter

content: Constructed a full-scale computer virtually, including the hardware and software. Built the computer platform using a simple HDL and simulated it on a hardware simulator. Implemented an assembler, a virtual machine and a compiler for a high-level programming language called Jack.
summary: Constructed a full-scale computer virtually, including the hardware and software. Built the computer platform using a simple HDL and simulated it on a hardware simulator. Implemented an assembler, a virtual machine and a compiler for a high-level programming language called Jack.
title: From Nand to Tetris
